    • Uses of WeightException in boundary.weight

      Methods in boundary.weight that throw WeightException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WeightTranslation.clearDisplayAndShowWeight()
      Clearing all that can be cleared, removeMsg() + removeLongMsg() + removeInputWithMsg() + showWeightDisplay()
      void WeightTranslation.closeAllLeaks()
      Closes all open objects
      int WeightTranslation.getInputWithMsg(java.lang.String promtMessage, int defaultNumber, java.lang.String unit)
      Shows a message on the display where the weighter must send a message back.
      double WeightTranslation.getTaraWeight()
      Will set the tara weight on the weight to what's currently the weights' load.
      double WeightTranslation.getWeight()
      Will take the current weight load of the weight and pull it into a double.
      void WeightTranslation.removeInputWithMsg()
      Removes the displayed message on the weight.
      void WeightTranslation.removeLongMsg()
      Removes a long message
      void WeightTranslation.removeMsg()
      Removes a normal message on weight.
      void WeightTranslation.removeTaraWeight()
      Remove the tara weight from the weight.
      void WeightTranslation.showLongMsg(java.lang.String recvMessage)
      Shows a long message, can only show 30 char's
      void WeightTranslation.showMsg(java.lang.String recvMessage)
      Shows message on weight, can only show 6 char's
      void WeightTranslation.showWeight()
      Shows the normal weight-mode on the display
      Constructors in boundary.weight that throw WeightException 
      Constructor and Description
      WeightTranslation(int port)
      Constructor that takes in the port of the weight.
